name: All in One Night
description:
This is our submission to the Brackeys 2022.1 game jam. The jam's theme was "it is not real", so the first thing we thought of was Santa Clause! 

Our game is a strategy game where you have to choose how to navigate the streets in order to deliver as many gifts as you can before the night is up. 

We would love to hear any feedback; we had a lot of fun making this one!

Team:

Casey Dean - Artist 

David Cameron - Developer/Team Lead

Tyler Miller - Developer/Unity guy

Audio:

Unity Asset - Ultimate Game Music Collection
